comments.body: Sorry, I didn't get this. Do you always test only `YearMonthIntervalType()`?

> Sorry, I didn't get this. Do you always test only `YearMonthIntervalType()`?

We can write different field of YearMonthIntervalType tp arrow, but in arrow's type it only support year_to_month
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46485123/123025989-09901400-d40e-11eb-8581-5e9dfe4f9a33.png)
And the IntervalUnit only support year_to_month, 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46485123/123026045-20cf0180-d40e-11eb-940c-24ab76aa9a79.png)

So when we read data from Arrow, it only can be default YearMonthIntervalType()
